text:
Javiera Margarita Odija Ubal Muñoz (28 May 1977 – 18 January 2018) was a Swedish singer. She was of Chilean-Spanish descent. She participated in Melodifestivalen twice, in 2000 with "Varje timma, var minut", and in 2002 with "No hay nada más". She was born in Motala, Sweden.
In 2003, she received a musical grant for promoting Latino Music in Sweden.
Muñoz died on 18 January 2018 in Gothenburg, Sweden at the age of 40.
